name: Nasha Market: Seeing Is Believing
description: A common two-story shopfront in Nasha Town, prized for its spacious, moisture-free interior that is ideal for storing books. Mimisbrunnr Books is one such establishment.\nA bookstore peddles fascinating and bizarre adventure tales, whispered gossip, and eye-catching headlines. The authenticity of their contents, however, remains decidedly unvouched for.
